short_summary: Request for Standing Offers. Inspect and Service Vehicle & Platform Hoists for the Department of National Defence.
description: Inspect and Service Vehicle & Platform Hoists for the Department of National Defence. Reissue of Request for Standing Offers.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement** =============== **Title** -------- * En: Inspect and Service Vehicle and Platform Hoists * Fr: Services d'inspection et d'entretien des ponts élévateurs pour véhicules et dispositifs de levage à plateforme **Reference and Solicitation Information** -------------------------------------- * ID: WS4057358633 * Code: Doc4218726349 * Amendment Number: 0 **Publishing and Closing Information** ----------------------------------- * **Publishing Date**: Tuesday, September 19, 2023 * **Closing Date**: Wednesday, October 11, 2023, at 14:00 ET **Information** -------------- This tender is a reissue of a Request for Standing Offers for the provision of inspection and servicing services for vehicle and platform hoists for the [Department of National Defence](#endUserEntitiesName-nomEntitesUtilisateurFinal-eng). **Technical Description** ------------------------ The tender is seeking offers from service providers to inspect and service vehicle and platform hoists located at 4 Wing Cold Lake, Cold Lake, Alberta, on an as-required basis. **Key Requirements** ------------------- * The successful bidder(s) shall provide all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision for inspections, maintenance, repairs, and installation of hydraulic/electrical ramps and hoists. * The services shall be provided on an as-required basis for the Department of National Defence. **Procurement Method and Selection Criteria** ------------------------------------------- * Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding * Selection criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price **Supporting Documents and Submissions** ---------------------------------------- All required supporting documentation and bid submissions shall be submitted electronically to Ariba Discovery. **Important Dates** ------------------ * Closing time: 14:00 ET, October 11, 2023 * Late bids will be declared non-responsive. **Contact Information** --------------------- Keenan, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC) Email: [matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) Germany does a replicative study for Kovac as spectators depend on TV
